First we load the "simBM" package.
```{r loadlibrary}
library(simBM)
```

Then we Simulate 2 dimension brownian motion and plot the path figure.
```{r simulate2d}
x <- simBM(10000, 1)
```
```{r fig.width=4,fig.height=4}
plotBM(x)
```
